item.title: Microsoft expects to spend $80 billion on AI-enabled data centers in fiscal 2025
item.description: Over half of Microsoft's $80 billion in spending will take place in the U.S., Microsoft Vice Chair and President Brad Smith wrote in a Friday blog pos...

item.title: Trump sentencing set for Jan. 10, judge leans toward no jail, no probation, no fine
item.description: Donald Trump is the first U.S. president ever to be convicted of a crime.

item.title: Rivian stock has its best day ever after EV maker reports 2024 production, deliveries
item.description: Rivian on Friday said it produced 49,476 electric vehicles last year.

item.title: GM, Ford report best annual U.S. sales since 2019 as auto recovery continues
item.description: Both General Motors and Ford Motor on Friday reported their best annual U.S. new vehicle sales since 2019.

item.title: Investors head into next week with a cloudy January outlook and a looming jobs report
item.description: Wall Street is carefully watching to see how January shapes up, as it is the month that historically sets the tone for the rest of the year.
